list.head: Contact Information:
list.item: Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers Relating to the Treaty of Tlateloco,
1964-1967
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 150 items (typed transcripts).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers Relating to the Treaty of Tlatelolco, Accession #9775, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library by Hon. Alfonso Garcia Robles, Sub-Secretario, Tlatelolco, Mexico City, Mexico through John R. Redick on 1972 January 13.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers are from the discussion session of the Treaty of Tlatelolco to prohibit nuclear weapons in Latin America. The collection contains agendas, speeches, and official correspondence from four series of meetings held in Mexico.

did.unittitle: Preliminary Session through Second Period of Sessions folder 2
Second Period of Sessions folder 3 through Third Period of Sessions folder 2
Third Period of Sessions folder 3 through Third Period of Sessions folder 6
